price: Wͻbuu no ᴐtorofoᴐ, enti asotwee sͻͻ wͻn mu wͻ nwunu da anaa esum da bi mu. Nokorε sε na εyε asotwee kεseε Da.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahum ʿadhābu yawmi al-ẓulati innahu kāna ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
